title: Death Domain
content: a thought. Once per turn, yhou can use Telekinesis again without expending a spell slot. 10 Turns STR SaveConcentration BLADE BARRIER Lv 6 Evocation Action 6-60 Damage 6d10 Slashing Summons a wall of razor-sharp blades that turns the area into Difficult Terrain and damages anyone foolish enough to come close. 1 Turn 18m DEX SaveConcentration CREATE UNDEAD Lv 6 Necromancy Action Raise a corpse as a heinous mummy that fights by your sde. Until Long Rest The target must be a Medium or Small corpse.
